description: A provider class for managing reactive state related to notes, including CRUD operations, search, and tagging within a Flutter application.

classes.name: NoteProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based provider for notes, managing their state and operations such as search, filtering by tags, and CRUD actions.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the provider by fetching the current list of notes.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Refreshes the list of notes based on current search and tag filters.

methods.name: setSearch
methods.description: Updates the search string and refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: setActiveTag
methods.description: Sets the active tag filter and refreshes the notes list.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with specified title, content, and tags, then refreshes the list.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note with new data, ensuring all tags exist, then refreshes.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID and refreshes the list.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID.
